ags:resource.dc:title: Animación erupción de La Restinga
ags:resource.dc:description: Aerial photo from Involcán flight on board Guardia Civil helicopter. DEM from multibeam echosounder data gathered on board R/V Ramón Margalef during IEO Bimbache cruises

Animation showing: first an aerial photo of the sting on the sea surface of the eruption area took from Guardia Civil helicopter and, after a peel off effect, a digital elevation model including the volcano bathymetry appear.
